explains: n. 丧失抵押品赎回权

sentences.en: If homeowners can't keep up the payments, they face foreclosure.
sentences.cn: 如果房主不能继续还贷，他们就面临抵押品赎回权被取消的危险。

sentences.en: Others lost their homes to foreclosure.
sentences.cn: 另外一些为取消赎回权失去了房子。

sentences.en: Lakeland, Florida has also seen high rates of foreclosure.
sentences.cn: 又如佛罗里达州的莱克兰，该市的止赎率也很高。
